Overview

The XMOJO project is a free open source implementation of JMX specification. This implementation is derived from AdventNet's JMX implementation, which has been available in the industry since 1999.  XMOJO also contains contributions of adaptors, such as HTML and RMI and rich tools, such as MBean Browser.
 
 
The XMOJO Project 5 API Documentation
JMX API This consists of XMOJO implementation for JMX specification final release, 1.0. 
JMX Adaptors This consists of JMX adaptors implementation for HTML and RMI protocols.
JMX Clients This consists of JMX server-client API for RMI protocol.

The XMOJO Project 5
